My pets are a good way to keep my mind off of my divorce.

content.text: Hello, I'm currently looking for some new friends. What about you?
Hey there, I'm a single parent raising my kids on my own. How about you?
That sounds really challenging, I can't imagine doing it alone. I'm married and we have two kids together.
I think it's definitely made me stronger as a person, but it definitely has its moments.
I'm sure it has, I'm impressed. What are some of your hobbies?
I'm a psychology major, so I really enjoy reading about human behavior. I also have a few pets that help me keep my mind off of things.
That sounds really interesting, I'm sure your kids love hearing about your studies. I have a blog that I write about my favorite comic books and animals.
That's awesome! I love comics, but I'm not very good at drawing them myself.
I'm not great at it either, but it's a lot of fun to create my own stories.
It sounds like you have a lot of interesting hobbies. I'm sure we can find some things to talk about
